name: RSI Bollinger Mean Reversion Equity
description: Daily mean-reversion strategy for large-cap U.S. equities. It combines RSI oversold/overbought signals with Bollinger Band extremes to capture snap-back moves, sizes each trade at 2 % of equity, and uses a 1.5 % hard stop with a 3 % profit target (≈2:1 reward-to-risk).
